text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Who said they had to hit a target of 100,000? It should have just been test, test, test. There didn’t need to put a figure to it. Targets never bare well, you only have to look at the NHS to see that. It was very evident they were never going to achieve it.
